meanings.sent1: He was hurling the ball across the field.
meanings.sent2: She hurled the stone into the lake.
meanings.sent3: The angry toddler started hurling toys around the room.
meanings.sent4: The storm was hurling rain against the windows.
meanings.sent5: The chef was expertly hurling vegetables into the pan.

meanings.sent1: The local team practices hurling every weekend.
meanings.sent2: Fans gathered to watch the exciting game of hurling.
meanings.sent3: Playing hurling requires skill and teamwork.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the hurling match echoed through the stadium.
meanings.sent5: Hurling is a fast-paced and thrilling sport to watch.
